iis:applicationpool_test.comment: Ensure 'identity_type' is case insensitive equals to 'ApplicationPoolIdentity'
Ensure 'application_count' is less than or equal to '1'

iis:systemweb_test.comment: Ensure 'forms_protection' is case insensitive equals to 'All'
Ensure 'forms_credential_format' is case insensitive not equal to 'Clear'
Ensure 'forms_credential_format' is case insensitive not equal to 'Clear'
Ensure 'custom_errors' is case insensitive not equal to 'Off'
Ensure 'http_error_mode' is case insensitive equals to 'DetailedLocalOnly'
Ensure 'session_state_cookieless' is case insensitive equals to 'UseCookies'

iis:webconfig_test.comment: Ensure 'request_limits_max_url' is less than or equal to '4096'
Ensure 'request_limits_max_query' is less than or equal to '2048'
